plasma.resource.filetype.title: File type
plasma.resource.filetype.description: file type of the resource data. E.g. csv, jpg, pdf

plasma.resource.datatype.title: Data type
plasma.resource.datatype.description: kind of digital data which are saved with the resource. E.g. data table, SEM image, cfu-plot, high-speed video

plasma.resource.range.title: Range
plasma.resource.range.description: range in which the resource is valid. E.g. wavelength range: 400\u2026800 nm

plasma.resource.quality.title: Quality
plasma.resource.quality.description: data quality score. E.g. verified, published, reviewed
